panels.description: Zeigt die kumulative Gesamtzahl der in einem bestimmten Zeitraum gesendeten Pakete.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  COUNT(*) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      time
  )
FROM
  mesh_packet_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND message_size_bytes IS NOT NULL
  AND source_id IN ($nodeID)
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time;

panels.title: Pakete gesendet

panels.description:
Zeigt die Arten von Paketen im ausgew√§hlten Zeitbereich an.

Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter: https://buf.build/meshtastic/protobufs/docs/main:meshtastic#meshtastic.PortNum

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  portnum,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM
  mesh_packet_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND source_id IN ($nodeID)
GROUP BY
  portnum
ORDER BY
  time;

panels.title: Pakettypen gesendet

panels.description: Das letzte Mal, als ein Paket von diesem Knoten gesendet wurde

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  *
FROM
  mesh_packet_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND source_id IN ($nodeID)
ORDER BY
  time;

panels.title: Letztes Paket gesendet

panels.description: Zeigt die kumulative Gesamtzahl der in einem bestimmten Zeitraum empfangenen Pakete.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  COUNT(*) OVER (
    ORDER BY
      time
  )
FROM
  mesh_packet_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND message_size_bytes IS NOT NULL
  AND destination_id IN ($nodeID)
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time;

panels.title: Pakete empfangen

panels.description:
Zeigt die Arten von Paketen im ausgew√§hlten Zeitbereich an.

Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter:
https://buf.build/meshtastic/protobufs/docs/main:meshtastic#meshtastic.PortNum

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  portnum,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM
  mesh_packet_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND destination_id IN ($nodeID)
GROUP BY
  portnum
ORDER BY
  time;

panels.title: Pakettypen empfangen

panels.description: Das letzte Mal, als ein Paket von diesem Knoten empfangen wurde.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  *
FROM
  mesh_packet_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND destination_id IN ($nodeID)
ORDER BY
  time;

panels.title: Letztes Paket empfangen

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  *
FROM
  node_details
WHERE
  node_id = '$nodeID'
LIMIT
  1

panels.description: Grafik, die aus Nachbarschaftsinformationsberichten erstellt wurde und die Signalst√§rke f√ºr jede Leitung anzeigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  node_id AS "id",
  long_name AS "title",
  short_name AS "subtitle",
  hardware_model AS "Hardware",
  role AS "Rolle",
  "#808080" AS color
FROM
  node_details
WHERE
  node_id = "$nodeID"
  OR node_id = "$relatives"

SELECT 
    CONCAT(neighbor_id, '_', node_id) AS id,
    neighbor_id AS "source",
    node_id AS "target",
    snr AS "mainstat",
    CASE
        WHEN snr < -13 THEN '#E74C3C'  -- Red for SNR < -13
        WHEN snr < -7 THEN '#F4D03F'   -- Yellow for -13 ‚â§ SNR < -7
        ELSE '#2ECC71'                 -- Green for SNR ‚â• -7
    END AS "color",
    GREATEST(0.1, LEAST(2, 1 + ((snr + 13) / 10))) AS "thickness"
FROM 
    node_neighbors
    WHERE (neighbor_id IN (${nodeID:singlequote}) OR neighbor_id IN (${relatives:singlequote}))
    AND (node_id IN (${nodeID:singlequote}) OR node_id IN (${relatives:singlequote}))

panels.title: Node Graph

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  temperature,
  time
FROM
  environment_metrics
WHERE
  node_id = $nodeID
  AND temperature IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
  node_id,
  
  -- Environment Update Informationen
  CASE
    WHEN environment_update_interval_sec > 1
    THEN SEC_TO_TIME(environment_update_interval_sec)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS environment_update_interval,
  DATE_FORMAT(environment_update_last_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS environment_update_last_timestamp,
  
  -- Device Update Informationen  
  CASE
    WHEN device_update_interval_sec > 1
    THEN SEC_TO_TIME(device_update_interval_sec)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS device_update_interval,
  DATE_FORMAT(device_update_last_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS device_update_last_timestamp,
  
  -- Air Quality Update Informationen
  CASE
    WHEN air_quality_update_interval_sec > 1
    THEN SEC_TO_TIME(air_quality_update_interval_sec)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS air_quality_update_interval,
  DATE_FORMAT(air_quality_update_last_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS air_quality_update_last_timestamp,
  
  -- Power Update Informationen
  CASE
    WHEN power_update_interval_sec > 1
    THEN SEC_TO_TIME(power_update_interval_sec)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS power_update_interval,
  DATE_FORMAT(power_update_last_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS power_update_last_timestamp,
  
  -- Range Test Informationen
  CASE
    WHEN range_test_interval_sec > 1
    THEN SEC_TO_TIME(range_test_interval_sec)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS range_test_interval,
  DATE_FORMAT(range_test_last_packet_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS range_test_last_packet_timestamp,
  
  -- PAX Counter Informationen
  CASE
    WHEN pax_counter_interval_sec > 1
    THEN SEC_TO_TIME(pax_counter_interval_sec)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS pax_counter_interval,
  DATE_FORMAT(pax_counter_last_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pax_counter_last_timestamp,
  
  -- Neighbor Info Informationen
  CASE
    WHEN neighbor_info_interval_sec > 1
    THEN SEC_TO_TIME(neighbor_info_interval_sec)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS neighbor_info_interval,
  DATE_FORMAT(neighbor_info_last_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS neighbor_info_last_timestamp,
  
  -- Map Broadcast Informationen
  CASE
    WHEN map_broadcast_interval_sec > 1
    THEN SEC_TO_TIME(map_broadcast_interval_sec)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS map_broadcast_interval,
  DATE_FORMAT(map_broadcast_last_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS map_broadcast_last_timestamp,
  
  -- MQTT Informationen
  mqtt_encryption_enabled,
  mqtt_json_enabled,
  mqtt_configured_root_topic,
  DATE_FORMAT(mqtt_info_last_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS mqtt_info_last_timestamp,
  
  -- Letzte Aktualisierung
  DATE_FORMAT(last_updated, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS last_updated
  
FROM node_configurations
WHERE
  (environment_update_interval_sec > 1 OR
   device_update_interval_sec > 1 OR
   air_quality_update_interval_sec > 1 OR
   power_update_interval_sec > 1 OR
   range_test_interval_sec > 1 OR
   pax_counter_interval_sec > 1 OR
   neighbor_info_interval_sec > 1 OR
   map_broadcast_interval_sec > 1)
  AND node_id IN ($nodeID)

SELECT
  relative_humidity,
  time
FROM
  environment_metrics
WHERE
  node_id = $nodeID
  AND relative_humidity IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
  time;

panels.description: Zeig den gefundenen Node auf einer Karte an.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  node_id AS "Node ID",
  short_name AS "Kurzname",
  long_name AS "Langname",
  hardware_model AS "Hardware",
  role AS "Rolle",
  latitude AS "Latitude",
  longitude AS "Longitude",
  altitude AS "Altitude",
  precision_bits AS "Pr√§zision"
FROM
  node_details
WHERE
  longitude != 0
  AND longitude != 0
  AND node_id IN($nodeID)
GROUP BY
  node_id

panels.title: Standort

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  barometric_pressure,
  time
FROM
  environment_metrics
WHERE
  node_id = $nodeID
  AND barometric_pressure IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
  dm.time,
  dm.battery_level
FROM device_metrics dm
WHERE $__timeFilter(dm.time)
  AND dm.battery_level IS NOT NULL
  AND dm.node_id IN ($nodeID)
ORDER BY dm.time;

SELECT
  dm.time,
  dm.voltage
FROM device_metrics dm
WHERE $__timeFilter(dm.time)
  AND dm.voltage IS NOT NULL
  AND dm.node_id IN ($nodeID)
ORDER BY dm.time;

panels.description: Zeigt den gemessenen Strom aus den Kan√§len (1, 2, 3) an.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  ch1_current,
  ch2_current,
  ch3_current
FROM
  power_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND (
    ch1_current IS NOT NULL
    OR ch2_current IS NOT NULL
    OR ch3_current IS NOT NULL
  )
  AND node_id IN ($nodeID)
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time;

panels.title: Strommessung

panels.description: Zeigt die gemessenen Spannung aus den Kan√§len (1, 2, 3) an.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  ch1_voltage,
  ch2_voltage,
  ch3_voltage
FROM
  power_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND (
    ch1_voltage IS NOT NULL
    OR ch2_voltage IS NOT NULL
    OR ch3_voltage IS NOT NULL
  )
  AND node_id IN ($nodeID)
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time;

panels.title: Spannungsmessung

list.definition:
SELECT 
  CONCAT(long_name, " ", "(", node_id, ")") AS __text, 
  node_id as __value
FROM node_details 
ORDER BY long_name ASC;
list.label: Node ID
list.name: nodeID
list.query:
SELECT 
  CONCAT(long_name, " ", "(", node_id, ")") AS __text, 
  node_id as __value
FROM node_details 
ORDER BY long_name ASC;

list.definition:
SELECT
  neighbor_id AS "source",
  node_id AS "target"
FROM
   node_neighbors
WHERE
  node_id = "${nodeID}"
  OR neighbor_id = "${nodeID}"
list.label: relatives
list.name: relatives
list.query:

  neighbor_id AS "source",
  node_id AS "target"
FROM
   node_neighbors
WHERE
  node_id = "${nodeID}"
  OR neighbor_id = "${nodeID}"
